instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3330 A1286 Graphic crashes with wired shapes.
threads.message:
Hi 

I have this MacBook board is very clean and no liquid damaged.

Wired graphic crashes.


Can boot to OSX. tried with external monitor same issue with external monitor as well.
Boot with iGPU and no crashing with integrated GPU. works fine.
with above symptoms assuming Gmux is fine Tried to reflow the GPU still same.

Should I replace the GPU?
 or do you think it is something else?

Appreciate your advice.

threads.title: 820-3330 A1286 Graphic crashes with wired shapes.
threads.message: Try first to resolder U8900 with leaded solder...

threads.title: 820-3330 A1286 Graphic crashes with wired shapes.
threads.message:
Hi thank you for your advice.
Resolder U8900, still same issue. Replace U8900 with known good one , still same issue.

threads.title: 820-3330 A1286 Graphic crashes with wired shapes.
threads.message: Then the GPU is the problem...
